overview:
Mark A. McKinley is chairman and co-founder of Equator, the countryâ€™s premier provider of default servicing solutions. Mr. McKinley is a leader, innovator, mentor and business strategist.

Before co-founding Equator, Mr. McKinley was president of HomesDirect Inc., a software provider that enabled the Federal Housing Administration to hold online auctions for foreclosed properties. HomesDirect Inc. was acquired by eBay Inc. in 2002 and Mr. McKinley remained as president of eBay Inc.â€™s Lender Division where he helped develop a Web-based offer management system for mortgage lenders.
